MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnAvailableSpeeds (string inputId, float[] speeds);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAvailableSpeeds(string inputId, float32[] speeds) cil managed
abstract member OnAvailableSpeeds : string * single[] -> unit override this.OnAvailableSpeeds : string * single[] -> unit

Docs.param: The ID of the TV input bound to this view.

An ordered array of playback speeds, expressed as values relative to the normal playback speed (1.0), at which the current content can be played as a time-shifted broadcast. This is an empty array if the supported playback speeds are unknown or the video/broadcast is not in time shift mode. If currently in time shift mode, this array will normally include at least the values 1.0 (normal speed) and 0.0 (paused).
Docs.summary: This is called when time-shifting is enabled to inform the available speeds.

remarks.para: This is called when time-shifting is enabled to inform the available speeds.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnTimeShiftMode (string inputId, Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftMode mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTimeShiftMode(string inputId, valuetype Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftMode mode) cil managed
abstract member OnTimeShiftMode : string * Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftMode -> unit override this.OnTimeShiftMode : string * Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftMode -> unit

Docs.param: The ID of the TV input bound to this view.

The current time shift mode. The value is one of the following: TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_MODE_OFF, TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_MODE_LOCAL, TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_MODE_NETWORK, TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_MODE_AUTO.
Docs.summary: This is called when time shift mode is set or updated.

remarks.para: This is called when time shift mode is set or updated.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnTimeShiftStatusChanged (string? inputId, Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftStatus status);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTimeShiftStatusChanged(string inputId, valuetype Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftStatus status) cil managed
abstract member OnTimeShiftStatusChanged : string * Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftStatus -> unit override this.OnTimeShiftStatusChanged : string * Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftStatus -> unit

Docs.param: The ID of the TV input bound to this view.

The current time shift status. Should be one of the followings.
  • TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_STATUS_UNSUPPORTED
  • TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_STATUS_UNAVAILABLE
  • TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_STATUS_AVAILABLE
Docs.summary: This is called when the time shift status is changed.

remarks.para: This is called when the time shift status is changed.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnTvMessage (string inputId, Android.Media.TV.TVMessageType type, Android.OS.Bundle data);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTvMessage(string inputId, valuetype Android.Media.TV.TVMessageType type, class Android.OS.Bundle data) cil managed
abstract member OnTvMessage : string * Android.Media.TV.TVMessageType * Android.OS.Bundle -> unit override this.OnTvMessage : string * Android.Media.TV.TVMessageType * Android.OS.Bundle -> unit

Docs.param: The ID of the TV input bound to this view.
The type of message received, such as TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_TYPE_WATERMARK

The raw data of the message. The bundle keys are: TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_KEY_STREAM_ID, TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_KEY_GROUP_ID, TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_KEY_SUBTYPE, TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_KEY_RAW_DATA. See TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_KEY_SUBTYPE for more information on how to parse this data.
Docs.summary: This is called when a new TV Message has been received.

remarks.para: This is called when a new TV Message has been received.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnVideoUnavailable (string? inputId, Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason reason);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnVideoUnavailable(string inputId, valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason reason) cil managed
abstract member OnVideoUnavailable : string * Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason -> unit override this.OnVideoUnavailable : string * Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason -> unit

Docs.param: The ID of the TV input bound to this view.

The reason why the TV input stopped the playback:
  • TvInputManager#VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_UNKNOWN
  • TvInputManager#VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_TUNING
  • TvInputManager#VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_WEAK_SIGNAL
  • TvInputManager#VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_BUFFERING
  • TvInputManager#VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_AUDIO_ONLY
Docs.summary: This is called when the video is not available, so the TV input stops the playback.

remarks.para: This is called when the video is not available, so the TV input stops the playback.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
